metadata.title: CVE-2022-4167 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect Authorization check affecting all versions of GitLab EE from13.11 prior to 15.5.7, 15.6 prior to 15.6.4, and 15.7 prior to 15.7.2allows group access tokens to continue working even after the group ownerloses the ability to revoke them.

criterions.comment: check package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
